title: Deel 1
description: Jacobus Spaargaren wants a better life for his daughter Marleen than he had himself. But when his wife unexpectedly becomes pregnant, Jacobus calculates the extra spending will put a halt to Marleen's planned study.

title: Deel 2
description: On Marleen's first day working as a maid for the Oudemans family, her father is fined for making a monetary error at the bank.

title: Deel 3
description: Marleen's colleague Sien introduces her to her son Herman, who teaches Marleen to ride a bicycle. But when Jaap Oudemans tries to grope Marleen, she ends up losing her job.

title: Deel 4
description: Marleen gets a new job working for newspaper journalist Jan Griffioen and soon develops a crush on him. But when the Great War erupts, Griffioen has to report at the front.

title: Deel 5
description: During the Great War Marleen is courted by a Belgian soldier named Jef Verpoorte who asks her to become a Catholic. Afterwards she goes to work as a maid for Professor Buwalda.

title: Deel 6
description: Marleen meets the depressed but kindhearted Jan Engelmoer. When she returns home, she is dismayed to find Mrs. Buwalda dead in her bed.

title: Deel 7
description: Mrs. Scalonje moves into the Buwalda household after the death of Mrs. Buwalda. Marleen asks Jan Engelmoer to fix an antique chest owned by Professor Buwalda.

title: Deel 8
description: Despite objections from her parents and her employer, Margreet wants to marry Jan Engelmoer. She quits her job as Buwalda's maid and moves in with Jan.

title: Deel 9
description: Professor Buwalda visits 'Het Klein Verschil' to apologize to Marleen. As their little antique shop grows, Marleen collects all sorts of rarities in and around Amsterdam.

title: Deel 10
description: After the death of Jacobus Spaargaren, Marleen asks her mother to come stay with her and Jan offers 15 year old Eppo a job as his assistant.

title: Deel 11
description: Marleen arranges a place to stay in the country for depressed Alie Donkelaar and takes the care of Alie's three children upon herself.

title: Deel 12
description: When the loudmouth and rude artist Jos Boswinkel enters Het Klein Verschil, he and Marleen start arguing almost immediately. But she still asks him to take a look at the work of her brother Eppo.

title: Deel 13
description: Mrs Scalonje offers Marleen the chance to learn how to drive a car. Dr. Bresser informs Marleen that her husband Jan can never conceive a child. But Marleen, who desperately wants a child, refuses to tell Jan the truth.

title: Deel 14
description: Desperate to get pregnant, Marleen asks Jos Boswinkel to impregnate her, then forbids him to speak of it ever again.

title: Deel 15
description: After the birth of her daughter Susan, Marleen convinces Jan to move into a bigger house. Jos Boswinkel finds it difficult to cope with the situation of having a daughter he cannot acknowledge as well as working with Eppo.

title: Deel 16
description: Eppo becomes almost unmanageable in the Engelmoer household. He has firmly decided he wants to move to France to be an artist.

title: Deel 17
description: Marleen attends the wedding of Alie Donkelaar and cab driver Bertus Ongena. Attorny Blomkwist suggests she dresses up as Hendrickje Stoffels as part of a shop-window competition.

title: Deel 18
description: Jan has a heart attack when he gets upset with Blomkwist while Marleen is visiting Eppo in Paris. Eppo introduces her to the eccentric artist Andreus Bleyleve.

title: Deel 19
description: Jan has gallstones which have to be removed. When he is in the hospital, she confesses her secret to accountant Blomkwist, who advices her to write it all down in a letter.

title: Deel 20
description: Jan passes away in the hospital. At his funeral, Blomkwist and Dr. Bresser have an exchange about Marleen's secret. Bresser confides to know that Jan had also found sometime before he died.

title: Deel 21
description: Because of the impending war, Blomkwist advices Marleen to sell most of her antique shop and find another job. She decides to move house and begin a smaller shop instead, called 'Het Kleine Verschil'.

title: Deel 22
description: Marleen fires her old assistant carpenter Walraven after he makes anti-Semitic statements to Abraham Mossel. Dr. Bresser tells her to take holiday, so Marleen takes her mother and her daughter to stay with Jos Boswinkel and his wife.

title: Deel 23
description: Eppo returns unexpectedly from France and tells his family Bleyleven is on the way. Marleen goes on a job interview and where she confronts her old nemesis Jaap Oudemans.

title: Deel 24
description: Holland has been bombed and occupied by the Germans. Marleen is trying to find several people a place to hide. Then she spots a British parachutist and helps him to get to safety at Boswinkel's farm.

title: Deel 25
description: Having learned that Jaap Bleyleve is working for the resistance and did not betray his country, Marleen tries to get him to reconcile with his ill father Andreus.

title: Deel 26
description: When Marleen is celebrating her birthday at the Boswinkel house with all her friends and extended family, Germans soldiers arrive to search the place for any hidden Jews and resistance fighters.
